A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I grew up on Star Wars and think The Last Jedi is the best movie of the series thus far.  It's funny\, it goes to unexpected places in the overall story and ultimately it's a space fairytale for kids.  If you want to be entertained\, this movie fits the bill.  I went into the movie with little to no expectations of where it should go and I loved it.
